patthana23.40:1.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.40:2.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.40:3.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
